conbody.p: The Semios Web Application retrieves device log records from PHEMI Central using the Query Data APIs.
There are four kinds of data to retrieve:

ul.li: Metadata: Descriptive information generically describing the ingested data
Derived data: individual pieces of data extracted and transformed from ingested data used for later analysis
Aggregated data: calculated data based on the derived data
Raw Data: The data that was ingested

conbody.p: To support each type of data, separate HTTP GET APIs are provided.
